name: places/ChIJMaS99ZZZwokR3AVr-qAtbgc
formattedAddress: 1 Milligan Pl, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1 Milligan Pl, New York, NY 10011-8374, USA

originalText.text:
Dr Weinraub is a kind and incredible psychologist and person. His genuine care and calming presence immediately makes his office a safe and comfortable space. He is insightful and compassionate and his guidance and advice is always helpful and encouraging.

I have been seeing him for almost 3 years now and he has helped me through so much. He has been endlessly supportive through some difficult times in the past few years and I’ve always been at ease knowing that he was there to offer his support. When I was struggling most, he constantly reminded me that he was always there and that I’m not going through it all alone. I am extremely grateful for his continuous support and I feel lucky to have found someone so dedicated to helping me grow.

originalText.text: Sarton is an great therapist. He is highly intelligent, wise, kind, considerate and generous. I feel like he really cares and  he has been an amazing support. I am grateful to have him as my therapist and highly recommend him

text.text: Sarton is an great therapist. He is highly intelligent, wise, kind, considerate and generous. I feel like he really cares and  he has been an amazing support. I am grateful to have him as my therapist and highly recommend him

originalText.text:
Dr. Weinraub made a big difference in my life when I saw him as a teenager and more than I knew at the time. I had a lot of difficulties then that were normalized.

Dr. Weinraub was extremely patient with my immaturity, listened and seemed to be the only person that clearly saw the kind of person I was despite the circumstances I grew up in. I was 14 when I first saw him and he told me that when I was 30, my life would be so different in so many positive ways. Hearing you have to wait more than twice your lifetime isn’t reassuring at 14 and after a few years I stopped seeing Weinraub but he remained a good influence on my life and my attempts to connect with other people in a healthier way that shows others care.

Now I’m in my 30s and I have a very good life. Most of what he had told me turned out to be spot on and more. As my life came together, I remembered my talks with him and having someone that saw me for who I was as a child was part of the therapy I needed to get to where I am now.

This review is from an account that keeps my privacy but my experience with him is very real, he shows care for your wellbeing and he is someone you can safely reach out to if you need therapy as I’ve recently done again.

originalText.text: Dr. Sarton Weinraub is an absolutely excellent, one of a kind therapist who's listening skills are top notch. During our discussions, his genuine empathy and compassion shines all the way through. He is able to see what exactly is the issue at its core and directly asks the right questions to make you really think about it. At the end of our sessions, I was always in a state where I was empowered and inspired to come up with a solution for life's many challenges. I am happy and thankful that I have crossed paths with Dr. Sarton. I highly recommend Dr. Sarton to anyone that is looking for a therapist that will truly understand you.

originalText.text: I’ve been working with Dr.Weinraub for about a year now and I have to say it’s one of the best decisions I ever made. He is by far one of the best psychologists out there and I would recommend him to everyone. He always makes time to listen, offers genuine advice and you can tell that he cares. I am so grateful to have met him, he is amazing!
